transArray.content: The environment is good and the facilities are new. But 600 yuan is too much money to live in such a small house, it may be expensive because of the location. The glass panel in the toilet shower room has an unobstructed view. The surface pool is outside and at the same location as the pavilion. I don't know why, but there is a load-bearing column next to the bed, and the layout is uncomfortable. It is too different from the net map
